subject: Re: [junit] HELP Required Please!
msgSnippet: ... Please show us the command you re using to launch JUnit, and tell us where you unpacked JUnit on your file system. We can help. -- J. B. Rainsberger,
messageBody:
m.j.mcardle@... wrote:

> Hi,
>
> I'm new to using to junits and linux. I've installed junits and
> believe I've set the classpaths right but java junit.textui.TestRunner
> junit.samples.AllTests etc don;t work and simply give exceptions.
>
> Can someone give me indepth instructions on how to install junits on
> Linux please. I'm running Fedora 2 linux.

Please show us the command you're using to launch JUnit, and tell us
where you unpacked JUnit on your file system. We can help.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
